thread.title_full: Unicorn food is taking over Instagram, and we‚Äôre definitely not upset about it

author: Real Simpe
title: Unicorn food is taking over Instagram, and we‚Äôre definitely not upset about it
text:
Unicorn food is taking over Instagram, and we‚Äôre definitely not upset about it If 2016 was the year of galaxy desserts and all things rainbow (like this healthy rainbow pizza ), 2017 is heralding in a riff on both: unicorn foods.
Like galaxy cupcakes, they‚Äôre shimmery thanks to sprinkles, sparkly candy, or even gold leaf. They‚Äôre just as colorful as rainbow bagels, but come in pastel hues. Sometimes they‚Äôre shaped like actual unicorns, while other times fluffy ingredients (marshmallows, cotton candy, or frothy foam) stand in for soft unicorn fur. In a word, they‚Äôre whimsical.
Here‚Äôs a rundown of all of the different variations we‚Äôve spotted.
1. The Latte A unicorn latte always does the trick : @esarahcampbell 
A post shared by The End Brooklyn (@thendbrooklyn) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:58am PST 
A Brooklyn-based caf√© is serving up frothy beverages dyed with natural coloring like mineral-rich blue-green algae.
2. The Toast It's my birthday and I'll have all the rainbow/unicorn toast my heart desires ü¶Ñ #aquariusseason 
A post shared by Adeline Waugh (@vibrantandpure) on Feb 16, 2017 at 1:04pm PST 
Avocado toast just got served. This homemade creation is smeared with colorful cream cheese and garnished with gold leaf (because why not?). And there‚Äôs no food coloring. Beet juice makes pink; turmeric, yellow; chlorophyll, green, and so on.
3. The Starbucks Ombre Drinks Secret Menu Item! Introducing a second 2-toned @starbucks: Pink Purple Drink as well as the Matcha Pink Drink! #drinktherainbow #pinkpurpledrink #matchapinkdrink : Matcha Pink Drink - 3 parts Strawberry Acai Refresher with Coconut Milk and 1 part Matcha Green Tea with Coconut Milk : Pink Purple Drink - 1 part Strawberry Acai Refresher with Coconut Milk and 1 part Passion Ice Tea with Soy Milk, Vanilla Syrup & Blackberries : @starbucks Be sure to ask your @starbucks barista to mix the first part in, add ice and slowly add the last part in for that cool ombre effect. This is 100% real. Thanks @dailyfoodfeed for the cool Match Pink Drink, which is legit! Always remember to tip your barista! These ombr√© drinks not only look cool as hell but taste freaking delicious! 
A post shared by Adam Alvarado Founder, CEO (@adam.lotusgroup) on Feb 27, 2017 at 8:24pm PST 
Intentionally or not, the new off-menu two-toned drinks (the Matcha Pink Drink and the Pink Purple Drink) totally fit in with the unicorn food trend.
4. The Hot Chocolate I'm pretty sure this is what unicorn poop tastes like. ü¶Ñ #oceats #dr nks #sw ts #unicornpoop #ü¶Ñ 
A post shared by Hee Jin L. [SF Bay ‚Ä¢ LA] (@hungryhungryheejin) on Feb 25, 2017 at 9:21pm PST 
You‚Äôll definitely need a spoon.
5. The Milkshake We had so much fun filming with @thisisinsiderfood the other day. Click on the link in bio to see what we stirred up! ü¶Ñ . . : @hungryhippie_ 
A post shared by New Territories NY (@newterritoriesny) on Feb 8, 2017 at 3:48pm PST 
Meet the Unicorn Parade, from New York City-based dessert shop, New Territories. Made from Van Leeuwen ice cream, it‚Äôs topped with an ube swirl a twisted marshmallow ‚Äúhorn.‚Äù
6. The Macaroon 
Macarons studded with @Bakesbox sprinkles!!! 
A post shared by Felicity & Krystle (@junipercakery) on Feb 27, 2017 at 12:10am PST 
Robin‚Äôs egg blue cookies sandwich shimmery sprinkles. To DIY, you can buy these sprinkles on Etsy.
7. The Cake 
Hello! From my Fantasy Unicorn! ‚ù§Ô∏è A birthday cake for a 1st Birthday! Layers of Valrhona Chocolate and Nutella Banana Cake with vanilla swiss meringue buttercream. #sweetsandspatula #bbcgoodfood #yahoofood #bakersofsgp #bakersofinstagram #cakestagram #cakepic #cakeporn #cakeporm #cakedesign #herworldsg #unicorncake #whatibakedtoday #homebaking #homebaker #instacakers #instacake #undiscoveredbaker #sgbakes #sgcakes #sgbakers #foodpic #foodporn #feedfeed #f52grams #asiafoodprn #birthdaycake #celebrationcake #bakespiration #8dayseat 
A post shared by Lynn (@sweets_and_spatula) on Feb 28, 2017 at 6:58am PST 
We‚Äôll be requesting this for our next birthday.
8. The Donut 
Rainbow conversation heart donuts and Netflix tonight! What's everyone watching/eating?! #donutworrybeawwsam 
A post shared by Sam Ushiro (@aww.sam) on Feb 10, 2017 at 6:09pm PST 
Because no one eats a regular glazed anymore.
This article originally appeared in Real Simple .
